[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros. split. - intros. induction n. + simpl in H. rewrite list_an_length in H. lia. + simpl in H. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r in H. apply in_app_or in H. destruct H. * apply IHn in H. lia. * apply in_cons in H. destruct H. { apply Nat.le_succ_l in H. lia. } - intros. induction n. + simpl. lia. + simpl. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. apply in_or_app. destruct H. * left. apply IHn. lia. * right. apply in_cons. split. { apply Nat.lt_succ_r in H. lia. } { apply IHn. lia. }
